title: Masari (MSR) Achieves Market Capitalization of $2.84 Million
content: Masari (CURRENCY:MSR) traded up 1.7% against the US dollar during the 1 day period ending at 17:00 PM ET on June 2nd. One Masari coin can now be bought for approximately $0.50 or 0.00006587 BTC on popular exchanges including TradeOgre, SouthXchange and Stocks.Exchange. Over the last seven days, Masari has traded 2.3% lower against the US dollar. Masari has a market cap of $2.84 million and $15,930.00 worth of Masari was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours.    Here’s how related cryptocurrencies have performed over the last 24 hours:    Dero (DERO) traded down 9.8% against the dollar and now trades at $2.60 or 0.00034036 BTC.  Fantomcoin (FCN) traded up 8.7% against the dollar and now trades at $0.13 or 0.00001700 BTC.  Dinastycoin (DCY) traded down 12.1% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0005 or 0.00000006 BTC.  Dashcoin (DSH) traded 1.4% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0190 or 0.00000249 BTC.  QuazarCoin (QCN) traded up 29.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0153 or 0.00000200 BTC.  BipCoin (BIP) traded 3.6% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.0406 or 0.00000532 BTC.  Bitcedi (BXC) traded down 0.7% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0099 or 0.00000109 BTC.   Masari Coin Profile     Masari (MSR) is a proof-of-work (PoW) coin that uses the  Cryptonight hashing algorithm. Its genesis date was September 2nd, 2017. Masari’s total supply is 5,652,699 coins. The official website for Masari is getmasari.org . Masari’s official Twitter account is @masaricurrency . The Reddit community for Masari is /r/masari and the currency’s Github account can be viewed here .  Buying and Selling Masari    Masari can be purchased on the following cryptocurrency exchanges: Stocks.Exchange, SouthXchange and TradeOgre. It is usually not presently possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as Masari directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to acquire Masari should first buy Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as GDAX, Gemini or Changelly. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to buy Masari using one of the exchanges listed above.
